div.head: Case Study 2: a German novel in rich TEI
div.p:
The recipe:
Take a richly marked-up text (from DTA) and apply an XSLT stylesheet to remove non ELTeC tagging
Where content as well as tags are to be removed, insert comment tags
Otherwise, just remove tags
Special TEI elements (e.g. choice) need special attention
The header may need hand editing
What to do when TEI usage is unexpected (e.g. n on div ?
